backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with ordered maps and types for journeys, locations, media, user profiles, bookmarks, and geoname city data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI feature requirements, related files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like document providing short descriptions of various frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the app entrypoint and includes the SunCalc library.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up providers and renders the backend debugger and main LocationMapExplorer component.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for managing journeys, schedules, and related data with calendar and form controls.
Development utility that exposes the backend actor and principal info to the browser console for debugging.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums with media uploads, social media link handling, and city selection logic using various backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Provides UI for importing, browsing, searching, and CRUD operations on Geoname city data with file parsing support.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Displays a 10-heart rating widget with hover effects, partial fills, and click-based rating selection.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Renders an interactive 3D globe with timezone overlays, city labels, animations, and customizable visual layers.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for uploading, updating, or deleting location photos with validation and backend integration.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Login/logout panel using Internet Identity with status display, error handling, and session management.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Large Leaflet-based map component that loads travel spots, bookmarks, and schedule markers, renders custom icons, and manages media popups and interactions.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and social media embeds in tabbed gallery format, including YouTube and Instagram embed support.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting music albums and songs, including file uploads and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Dialog-based music browser listing all albums and songs, allowing users to select a track for playback.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Audio player bar that loads songs, handles playback controls, volume, progress, and responds to selection from the music panel.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Handles uploading, validating, storing, and manually executing GeoJSON timezone data using backend and IndexedDB.
Displays journeys and schedules with filtering, editing, and itinerary rendering options.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: Provides a UI to create, edit, delete, and manage travel spots with media uploads and social media links.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows bookmarked and travel spot vibes grouped by city with type-based icons and interaction callbacks.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Allows users to configure website layout settings including map options and display preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks and utilities for backend data access, location geocoding, and social media URL validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark themes, fonts, and themed itinerary styles.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Functions for computing solar declination by day of year plus basic console test cases.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Helper to list timezone IDs matching a given UTC offset using quarterâ€‘hour rounding and DST-aware calculations.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Utilities for loading, validating, and caching timezone GeoJSON data using IndexedDB and backend fetches.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Utilities for rendering timezone boundaries on a 3D globe, including coordinate conversion, geometry cleanup, and offset-based timezone lookup.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Placeholder file for a country map explorer page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Implements a feature-rich 2D/3D map explorer with search, globe interactions, travel spots, bookmarks, music, and timezone display options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, plugins, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing itinerary UI features, known issues, and pending feature requests.
